thoughts.text: We should try to install another package using the 'execute_shell' command to see if the issue is specific to the package that we were trying to install.
thoughts.reasoning: Since we received an error message when we tried to use the 'execute_shell' command to install the package that we need, we should try to install another package using the 'execute_shell' command to see if the issue is specific to the package that we were trying to install. This will allow us to identify and resolve the issue, ensuring that we can install packages successfully in the future.
